subNodes.conversationText: root

"Hold there!"

You turn to see a strange, colourful lizard flying towards you with frantically flapping wings. It looks far too fat to stay in the air.
"What... who are you?"

"Heh! I am Ezzbel, a resident of the Raventhal, at your service!"

The weird little thing does a sort of comic bow in mid air.
"The Raventhal? Is that where I am?"

"Indeed it is!"

Your heart sinks. If this is the Raventhal, things are worse than you first thought.
"What exactly are you? Some kind of butterfly lizard?"

The weird creature audibly huffs. 

"I am a dragon!"
"You really aren't."
"I am. And I shall hear no more about it, otherwise I'll go and tell Torkal that you're safe to eat after all. You might have a fast tongue, but you don't fool me <Race>!"
"OK, I'm sorry. A dragon, yeah? That's fine by me."
"That's ok. You want to be careful, <Race>. You might have confused Torkal for the minute, but it will be back. You're not off the menu yet!"
"Do you know how I got here?"
"I didn't see. There was a terrible commotion at Vinazl's hut last night, but no surprise there. The squirrels have been going crazy recently."
"Vinazl?"
"Vinazl. The wizard out west. Been here for ages, up to no good no doubt. He's really got the squirrels riled up."
"You did say squirrels, right?"

The creature shudders.

"Nasty little bastards. They've been attacking everything on sight for as long as I can remember. I bet Vinzl had a hand in it."

"Listen, <Race>... I could help you get back to your village, you know. For a price."
"How could you help me?"
"You won't last long on your own. The squirrels will eat you. Or the undead. Or the troll. And I need to leave the forest as well, so safety in numbers, yes? What do you say?"
"Why do you need to leave the forest?"
The creature visibly bristles. "Its just time for me to leave. What can I say?"
"Ok. Its a deal."
The weird thing looks delighted. "Excellent! We shall set off at once."
"How do we get out of here, anyway?"

"There is a lake to the north west. I could probably fly to the other side, but perhaps not - its a long way. There is a path leading out somewhere to the north east though, and perhaps that's the best way to start."
"So... you're not really sure?"
"Of course not! Now, lets go."
This is going to be a weird day.
"Nice meeting you and everything, but I don't think I have much use for a fake dragon."
"Your loss," the creature snorts, and then heads back into the woods, flapping furiously.
Ahh, what the hell, what kind of use would you have had for a flapping butterfly lizard anyway.
"Squirrels?"
"They been attacking everything on sight for as long as I can remember. Nasty little bastards. I bet Vinazl had a hand in it."
"Vinazl?"

"The wizard out west. Been here for ages, up to no good no doubt."

The creature flaps thoughtfully. 

"I could help you get back to your village, you know... for a price."
"How could you help me?"
"You won't last long on your own. The squirrels will eat you. Or the undead. Or the troll. And I need to leave the forest as well, so safety in numbers, yes? What do you say?"
"Why do you need to leave the forest?"
The creature visibly bristles. "Its just time for me to leave. What can I say?"
"Ok. Its a deal."
The weird thing looks delighted. "Excellent! We shall set off at once."
"How do we get out of here, anyway?"

"There is a lake to the north west. I could probably fly to the other side, but perhaps not - its a long way. There is a path leading out somewhere to the north east though, and perhaps that's the best way to start."
"So... you're not really sure?"
"Of course not! Now, lets go."
This is going to be a weird day.
"Nice meeting you and everything, but I don't think I have much use for a fake dragon."
"Your loss," the creature snorts, and then heads back into the woods, flapping furiously.
Ahh what the hell, what kind of use would you have had for a flapping butterfly lizard anyway.
"Why don't you do that? Go and talk to him. He'd eat you as soon as spit at you."

The freaky little lizard thing snorts.

"Well, I was going to help you. But you're on your own now. I hope the squirrels eat you."

And so saying, it flaps its wings and disappears back into the forest.
Ahhh what the hell, it was ridiculous anyway. Time to move on.
"No, really? I've never met a dragon before. I thought you'd be... well, bigger."
"I am just as big as I need to be," the thing says solemnly.
"Do you know how I got here?"
"I didn't see. There was a terrible commotion at Vinazl's hut last night, but no surprise there. The squirrels have been going crazy recently."
"Vinazl?"

"The wizard out west. Been here for ages, up to no good no doubt."

"So... you're not really sure?"
"Of course not! Now, lets go."
